entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
